[above are Song Tags with notes imported from EasyWorship]

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Great and marvelous are all Your works oh Lord
King of the ages we give You praises
Who will not fear You or glorify Your name
We give You all our praise

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
All of the nations will worship before Thee
For You have revealed Your righteous
Deeds to us
You are the only one who is holy
Who will not fear You and who will not praise
Your holy name

verse.name: o1
verse.lines:
Who will not fear You and who will not praise
Who will not glorify Your awesome name
Who not celebrate all of Your ways
Almighty God
